abstract.locale: The TextEvent interface provides specific contextual information associated with Text Events.
Интерфейс TextEvent предоставляет контекстную информацию, относительно введенного текста.

description.locale: Specifies the event type.
Указывает на тип события (Event.type).
Specifies whether or not the event can bubble.
Указывает, может ли событие распространяться в фазе "bubbling".
Specifies whether or not the event's default action can be prevented.
Указывает, возможно ли отменить ответную реакцию браузера по умолчанию на событие.
Specifies view. This value may be null.
Содержит указатель на обьект представления.
Holds the value of the characters generated by the character device.
Содержит UTF-8 текст.
Specifies inputMethod value.
The language code for the text input, if available; otherwise, the empty string.
Initializes attributes of a TextEvent object.
Метод initTextEvent используется для инициализации значения объекта TextEvent.
The inputMethod attribute contains an indication of the origin of the text input.
Holds the value of the characters generated by the character device.
Содержит введенные данные.
The language code for the text input, if available; otherwise, the empty string.
The text string was input by an unknown means.
The text string was input through a keyboard.
The text string was pasted in from a clipboard.
The text string was inserted as part of a drag-and-drop operation.
The text string was entered through an Input Method Editor.
The text string was selected from a set of options presented, such as from a form.
The text string was input through a pen/tablet device and processed by handwriting recognition software.
The text string was input by a voice device and interpreted by speech recognition software.
The text string was inserted as part of an operation involving multiple input modalities in combination, such as pointer-enhanced speech.
The text string was inserted via a script operation on the DOM.
